A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is not a good movie and it has nothing to do with them trying do things different. Any film made like this\, be it a Star Wars film or not\, should be considered terrible. It is terribly written\, the characters have no well developed arcs (found myself realizing that I couldn't care less if most of the characters lived or died)\, and they try to turn every serious scene into a comedy with slaptick jokes and cutaways. This is easily the worst Star Wars movie ever made (and yes it is worse than episodes I & II).
